title.jp: May 6th~May 15th: Little Japan, Where Are You Going in Such a Hurry?

synopsis: There's quite a lot of racquet coming from Sae's apartment, so Yuno and Miyako set off to find out what's going on, only to find that the third years are planning a school trip to Hokkaido.
Hiro and Sae continue their school trip with a stroll through a glass making factory. Meanwhile, Yuno is unsure of how she can become a good upperclassman to her fellow students.

title.jp: August 31st: The Last Visitor of Summer Vacation

synopsis: The last day of Summer is here, and Yuno and Miyako are set to spend it having lots of fun! Unfortunately, no one told that to the typhoon making it's way toward the girls, so they have to retreat to Hiro's to wait it out.

title.jp: September 15th: A Shutter Chance Victory! Miyako Will Win!

synopsis: Miyako, Nori and Sae compete in the school's swim meet, while Yuno helps as one of the camera crew. Each girl is trying to win her event, and Yuno is trying to take the best possible pictures of the event.

title.jp: September 17th~19th: Nazyna's Cooking and September 28th: Reschedule at Midnight

synopsis: Nazuna accidentally lets it slip to her parents that she knows how to cook, knowing full well she doesn't. She enlists the help of Hiro and Yuno to make a dish worthy of her parents' admiration.

After chatting while drawing self portraits in class, Yuno and Miyako decide to try to talk all through the night. Meanwhile, Hiro is contemplating life after graduation, and goes to Ms Yoshinoya for advise.

title.jp: Oct 5th~6th: Split Over a Pamphlet, Art Contest, October 6th~8th: A Secret Date

synopsis: Yuno's class is tasked with designing a pamphlet for an upcoming school festival. Yuno works hard on her design and it ends up being chosen. Later, Yuno is invited on a date by Arisawa, where they catch up with each other.

title.jp: Oct. 11th~30th: The Terror! Preparing for Yamabuki Festival, Nov. 3rd: Eerie! The Day of the Yamabuki Festival

synopsis: Yuno's class decides to do a haunted house for the school festival, and Miyako ends up injuring her hand. On the day of the festival, Yu and Miyako run into Arisawa. Yuno's parents visit and Yuno escorts them around the school.

The Landlady brings everyone together to play a board game. The group has a great time learning more about each other and the apartments, but it also provides a moment to pause and think about their futures.

title.jp: December 2: An Educational Snowball Fight/ December 15: Hidamari Cheer Squad

synopsis: Snow Day! Or so it seems. The girls of the Sunshine Apartments must resist the lure of playing in the snow to focus on their studies. Will they succeed?

title.jp: December 22: It's Cause I'm Your Big Sister/December 21-24: Faint Memory of a Song

synopsis: Yoshinoya enlists the help of Yuno, Miya and their classmates to help her clear out some books from her house. Later, Sae invites Natsume to a Hidamari Apartments Christmas Party.

title.jp: December 31~January 1: Years Together, Years to Come

synopsis: With Hiro and Sae keeping busy studying for exams, the others help Nazuna write New Years Greeting cards. Afterwards, the girls get together for the first shrine visit of the year.
